announcements.title: Sports Fest Closure
announcements.summary: The RMV Clusters Phase II Sports Fest has come to a grand close! Thank you to all residents who participated and made it a memorable event.
announcements.body: The Sports Fest Closure event was held on February 1st with great enthusiasm from residents across all four blocks. It was a wonderful celebration of sportsmanship and community spirit. Watch the event highlights in the video below.
announcements.author: Sports Committee
